projects.name: NextGen Config
projects.summary: NextGen is the next-generation website platform for CDK global based on nodejs. Config team builds tools for the platform which help end users build their websites.
projects.responsibility: Worked on replacing existing wizard-like CMS application with a single-page application using CDK's internal CO framework. Latter worked on redesigning CMS to be inline editable CMS using react portals.

projects.name: BodyLog 365 LifeSmart
projects.summary: App to show reports and charts for Lifesmart Health devices. App also allows user to interact and share reports directly with doctor and pharmacist using Video and text chat.
projects.responsibility: Helped team design Angular JS base framework for

projects.name: My LifeSmart
projects.summary: Website for LifeSmart. Allows the user to buy products and app subscriptions.
projects.responsibility: Helped team to build a custom static site builder using markdown

projects.name: Cybage Technology Group
projects.summary: A group of architects managing technical hierarchy to guide and mentor a virtual team of developers.
projects.responsibility: I was part of the open source and frontend group and helped my hierarchy, which had people from multiple projects, with technical issues in these technologies. I was also responsible for creating and leading training programs on these technologies.

projects.name: MIS
projects.summary: Cybage MIS is Cybage's internal MIS application which includes multiple applications such as Leave admin, timesheet, and risk management.
projects.responsibility: The original application only worked on IE, which was an issue for mac and Linux users.  Initially I created chrome extension to make it work on Chome. Latter helped the team to migrate the system to a nodejs and angularjs application

projects.name: 123insight
projects.summary: 123insight is an end-to-end manufacturing enterprise management solution that covers everything from quoting, CRM, sales, and purchasing to stock control, subcontracting, goods in/out, and invoicing software systems suitable for all manufacturing types and industries.
projects.responsibility: Helped team with project architecture, and trained the existing .Net team on AngularJS. Was not involved in the day-to-day activities of the project, and helped as a consultant when needed by the team.

projects.name: Web 3.0
projects.summary: TravelClick is the leading provider of revenue-generating solutions for hoteliers across the globe. Web 3.0 is the reservation solution for hotels. It provides tools to build websites for hotel reservations.
projects.responsibility: We inherited half built project from another vendor, as a lead I helped tea to understand existing design and extend it.

projects.name: GuestView, Rate360 and OrderManager
projects.summary: TravelClick is the leading provider of revenue-generating solutions for hoteliers across the globe. GuestView, Rate360, and OrderManager are the suites of application catering to Guest management and Business Intelligence.
projects.responsibility: As a Technical Project manager, I was responsible for requirement discussions, design, and code reviews along with the delivery.

projects.name: HotelConfig
projects.summary: HotelConfig was part of the Business Intelligence products for Rubicon before being acquired by Travelclick and eventually replaced by GuestView, Rate360, and OrderManager.
projects.responsibility: I worked on a perl cgi based web application to configure the reporting tool to show competitive pricing information captured by PricePosisition.

projects.name: PricePosition
projects.summary: PricePosition was part of the Business Intelligence products for Rubicon before being acquired by Travelclick and eventually replaced by GuestView, Rate360, and OrderManager.
projects.responsibility: Write web crawlers to scrape data from hotels, car rentals, and airline websites. As a team, we maintained 300+ crawlers written to the websites to extract various data points.

projects.name: Farelogix
projects.summary: Farelogix is a leading provider of distribution technology and services for the travel industry. Its business model focuses on the delivery of solutions that lower the unit cost of distribution for both: Travel Sellers and Travel Suppliers.
projects.responsibility: As a project and domain lead, I was responsible for requirement discussions, and code review apart from development.
